name: feeds_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yummly.
Tool description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site
API description: Fetches a list of feeds from the Yummly API based on the given parameters for pagination and optional category tag.

start.description: The offset of items to be skipped in the response for paging.

limit.description: The number of items to be returned per response.

tag.description: The value representing a specific category/tag to filter the feeds list. Defaults to None.
